pages.title: Vault Powerups
pages.text: $(#033dfc)Vault Powerups$() are various items that add certain effects to your player!$(br2)These effects can include $(#033dfc)Haste$(), $(#033dfc)Speed$(), $(#033dfc)Strength$(), $(#033dfc)Parry$(), $(#033dfc)Resistance$() and even $(#033dfc)Luck$()!

pages.title: Consuming
pages.text: Upon consuming, you will be grant the effect and the $(#033dfc)Vault Powerups$() status effect, which will prevent you from using any other Vault powerup for that duration of time.$(br2)$(#033dfc)Vault Powerups$() can be crafted or obtained inside the $(#033dfc)Vault$().
